channel.title: Marine above "Level" in We've Got Hostiles
channel.description:
This only happens rarely, but near the end of WGH (where the player goes from the surface back into the vent system), at the section with Marines rappelling down from helicopters, one of them can end up above the playable area. He can still shoot the player, as the area around the blast hole isn't solid.
[code]map: bm_c1a3c at: -2473 x, 1229 y, -1694 z
setpos -2473.213623 1229.026733 -1694.052368;setang -58.728439 93.561226 0.000000[/code]
![](upload://pnipLT6FH962xo0QojaZATPnpkx.jpeg)
I've got a few skins on, as well as Surface Tension Uncut and a rebalancing script, but this happens in the base mod as well.

item.title: Marine above "Level" in We've Got Hostiles
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Yeah, I had problems with that as well, it’s best just to rush so it doesn’t happen.

Read full topic
item.source: Marine above "Level" in We've Got Hostiles

item.title: Marine above "Level" in We've Got Hostiles
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
This only happens rarely, but near the end of WGH (where the player goes from the surface back into the vent system), at the section with Marines rappelling down from helicopters, one of them can end up above the playable area. He can still shoot the player, as the area around the blast hole isn’t solid.

setpos -2473.213623 1229.026733 -1694.052368;setang -58.728439 93.561226 0.000000[/code]
